ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class ColorClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.ColorClassifier

  • public class ColorClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
    The ColorClassifier class samples the color sensor in RGB mode and uses the color data to classify an objects color as one of the known enumerated values.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Sinodinos, Minh Quan Hoang
